text: Allstate Arena (originally Rosemont Horizon) is a multi-purpose arena in Rosemont, Illinois. It is home to the Chicago Rush of the Arena Football League, DePaul University's men's basketball team, the Chicago Wolves of the AHL, and the Chicago Sky of the WNBA. It is located near the intersection of Mannheim Road and Interstate 90, adjacent to the city limits of Chicago and O'Hare International Airport. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Website *DePaul Athletics - Allstate Arena Category:Buildings and structures in Chicago Category:1980 establishments in the United States Category:1980s establishments in Illinois
title: Allstate Arena
